name: Evaluate.Belief.CommittedBelief
template: <arg1> believes with certainty that <arg2> is true
description: Explicit mention of an entity believing with certainty that an event or information object is true

name: Evaluate.Belief.NonCommittedBelief
template: <arg1> believes <arg2> is possibly but not necessarily true
description: Explicit mention of an entity believing an event or information object is possibly but not necessarily true; they do not have a strong belief in it

name: Evaluate.Intent.Intent
template: <arg1> intends, plans for, or attempts <arg2> event
description: Explicit mention of an entity intending a future event or planning or attempting to achieve it

name: Evaluate.Sentiment.Negative
description: Negative sentiment held by a person, organization, or GPE toward any knowledge element

name: Evaluate.Sentiment.Positive
description: Positive sentiment held by a person, organization, or GPE toward any knowledge element

name: Evaluate.Status.HoaxFraud
template: <arg1> holds that <arg2> is a hoax or a fraud
description: Explicit mentions asserting that an event or a thing is a hoax or fraud

name: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.ControlTerritory
description: A side, person, organization, location, or GPE controlling territory.

name: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.NationalityCitizen
description: The affiliation between an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) and a GPE.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

name: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.OwnershipPossession
description: The ownership or possession of an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) by a person, group, or side.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

name: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.Unspecified
description: The affiliation between an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) and another entity.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

name: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.Ethnicity
description: The affiliation between a person entity and an ethnicity.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

name: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.NationalityCitizen
description: The affiliation between a person entity and a GPE.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

name: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.Unspecified
description: The affiliation between a person entity and another entity.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

name: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationPoliticalReligiousAffiliation.NationalityCitizen
description: The affiliation between an organization entity and a GPE.  Organization-Political-Religious-Affiliation (OPRA)

name: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationPoliticalReligiousAffiliation.Unspecified
description: The affiliation between an organization entity and another entity.  Organization-Political-Religious-Affiliation (OPRA)

name: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationWebsite.OrganizationWebsite
description: An official top level URL for an organization entity's website

name: GeneralAffiliation.Sponsorship.Unspecified
description: The sponsorship of an event by a one-step removed sponsor (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain)

name: Information.Color.Color
description: The relation between an entity or thing and a color (string)

name: Information.Make.Make
description: The relation between a thing (such as an artifact, vehicle, or weapon) and its make or brand (string)

name: Measurement.Size.Count
description: Numerical totals of a countable entity or filler

name: Measurement.Size.HeightLengthWidth
description: Numerical value of a dimension of an entity or filler

name: Measurement.Size.Percentage
description: Percentage value of an entity or filler (such as results)

name: Measurement.Size.Unspecified
description: Numerical value of the size of an entity or filler, not otherwise specified

name: Measurement.Size.Weight
description: Numerical value of the weight of an entity or filler

name: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.Employment
description: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an employee, or with which the agent has a contractual business or service agreement

name: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.Membership
description: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an member, or with which the agent has a membership agreement

name: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.Unspecified
description: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an employee or member, or with which the agent has a contractual business or service agreement, where the context does not distinguish whether the relationship is employment or membership

name: OrganizationAffiliation.Founder.Founder
description: This relation captures a person entity and the organization founded by that person

name: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.Government
description: The relationship between a person and a governmental organization or GPE led by that person (who is not the head of state)

name: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.HeadOfState
description: The relationship between a person and a country GPE led by that person

name: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.MilitaryPolice
description: The relationship between a person and a military or police organization led by that person

name: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.Unspecified
description: The relationship between a person and an organization or GPE led by that person, where the context does not distinguish the nature of the organization

name: PartWhole.Subsidiary.NationalityCitizen
description: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations and GPEs, and between governmental organizations and their parent GPE

name: PartWhole.Subsidiary.OrganizationSubsidiary
description: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations, including relationships between a department within an organization and the organization itself, and between a company and its parent company

name: PartWhole.Subsidiary.Unspecified
description: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations and GPEs, where the context does not make it clear whether the parent in the hierarchy is an organization or a GPE

name: PersonalSocial.Relationship.Political
description: Otherwise unspecified political relationship between a person and another person

name: PersonalSocial.Relationship.Unspecified
description: Otherwise unspecified relationship between a person and another person

name: PersonalSocial.Role.ProfessionalRole
description: The relationship between a person and their position or occupation

name: PersonalSocial.Role.TitleFormOfAddress
description: The relationship between a person and their title or honorific

name: PersonalSocial.Role.Unspecified
description: The relationship between a person and their position, occupation, title, or honorific, where the context does not make it clear whether the role is a position or an honorific

name: Physical.LocatedNear.Surround
description: An entity or filler physically surrounding a place

name: Physical.LocatedNear.Unspecified
description: The physical location of an entity or filler

name: Physical.OrganizationHeadquarters.OrganizationHeadquarters
description: The relation between the headquarters of an organization and the GPE, LOC, or FAC entity in which the headquarters are located

name: Physical.Resident.Resident
description: All GPE, LOC, and FAC entities in which a person entity has lived

name: ResponsibilityBlame.AssignBlame.AssignBlame
description: An entity blamed for an event

name: ResponsibilityBlame.ClaimResponsibility.ClaimResponsibility
description: An entity claiming responsibility for an event

name: Physical.SameAs.SameAs
description: Arguments are co-referential.  This is not annotated or assessed, but is needed for entity relation representation
